    • withdraw

      public int withdraw​(double money)
      Calls for the withdraw method in the Actions class.

      It also checks if the user has enough money and if the user hasn't gone past the spending limit

      Specified by:
      withdraw in class Card
      Parameters:
      money - the amount of money withdrawn
      Returns:
      Whatever the withdraw action returns, unless it encounters a problem (then it returns 1 or 2)

    • send_money

      public int send_money​(int user_id, double money)
      Calls the send_money method from the Actions class

      It also updates the spending limit and does the spending limit checks, returning an error if the user is over the spending limit.

      Overrides:
      send_money in class Card
      Parameters:
      user_id - integer type id of the user the money will be sent to
      money - amount of money that will be sent
      Returns:
      Whatever the send_money method returns, or 1/2 if an issue occurs
